alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 8:50PM AKST until December 29 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Juneau area. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected early Wednesday morning. There is potential for freezing drizzle throughout the event, which would lower overall snowfall totals.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
